name: Ravemon_Burst_Mode
description: Ravemon Burst Mode is an enhanced version of the base Ravemon , whose armor turns completely black and silver. Where the original Ravemon only had one white wing attached to its arm, Burst Mode has both wings attached. Additional armor appear in the form of winged greaves, and the feet now possess talons, both colored like the wings. It is covered in a purple aura which is especially apparent in its wings.
